channel.title: Pages on OPRAmachine Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on OPRAmachine Blog

item.title: About OPRAmachine
item.author: gr@gavinrozzi.com (Gavin Rozzi)
item.description: OPRAmachine is a first of its kind statewide freedom of information portal that helps people obtain public records from New Jersey state and local government agencies. This website is the official blog of the project. We will periodically update this blog with information about the project and other items of interest.
